001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.SegmentCaptureUseCase;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CaptureConfig;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CompositionRoot;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
007import java.util.Map;
008
009/**
010 * Entry point for packet capture using the RADAR port-based pipeline.
011 * <p>Provides CLI argument parsing and bootstraps the {@link SegmentCaptureUseCase}.</p>
012 *
013 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
014 */
015public final class CaptureCli {
016  private CaptureCli() {}
017
018  /**
019   * Parses capture CLI arguments and runs the capture pipeline.
020   *
021   * @param args CLI arguments in {@code key=value} form; {@code iface} is required unless an alternate
022   *     {@code PacketSource} is selected via configuration
023   * @throws Exception if configuration validation or capture processing fails
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
027    Map<String, String> kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(args);
028    if (!kv.containsKey("iface") || kv.get("iface").isBlank()) {
029      usage();
030      return;
031    }
032
033    CaptureConfig captureCfg;
034    try {
035      captureCfg = CaptureConfig.fromMap(kv);
036    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
037      System.err.println("Invalid capture options: " + ex.getMessage());
038      usage();
039      return;
040    }
041
042    if (captureCfg.ioMode() == IoMode.KAFKA && captureCfg.kafkaBootstrap() == null) {
043      System.err.println("Invalid capture options: kafkaBootstrap is required for Kafka mode");
044      usage();
045      return;
046    }
047
048    CompositionRoot root =
049        new CompositionRoot(ca.gc.cra.radar.config.Config.defaults(), captureCfg);
050    SegmentCaptureUseCase useCase = root.segmentCaptureUseCase();
051    useCase.run();
052  }
053
054  private static void usage() {
055    System.err.println(
056        "usage: capture iface=<nic> [bufmb=1024 snap=65535 timeout=1 bpf='<expr>' immediate=true promisc=true] "
057            + "[out=out/segments|out=kafka:<topic>] [ioMode=FILE|KAFKA] "
058            + "[kafkaBootstrap=host:port] [kafkaTopicSegments=radar.segments]");
059  }
060}
